name: Slang
description:
Slang needs a gamepad and 2 players.

Controls

P1 Keyboard: Space to throw. Up Arrow to Jump. Arrow Key to Movement

P2 Gamepad: B to throw. Y to Jump. Left Analog to Movement

Credits:

This game developed at GGJ16

Azimet Ahmet - Artist

Enes Uğur Şekerci - Programmer

Kağan Kaya - Artist

Göktuğ Taş - Composer

http://globalgamejam.org/2016/games/slang
